page.title: 02ARDMORE PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: {OUR SCHOOL}is 54 years old.It is called{ARDMORE CONTROLLED PRIMARY {SCHOOL.}It has two teachers called-{ MRS CUMMINS, principal,and MRS HUNNIFORD,the assistant. There are two classrooms both { 6metres by 6metres.There is also a staffroom,dining-room,store and cloakrooms. Outside there is a small tarred area where we do CYCLING PROFICIENCY. Two small grass areas provide very small hockey or football pitches. We also have a playground with FOUR SWINGS,A SEE-SAW and A SAND-PIT. There are {45}pupils at our school,{22}of these are in P 1-3 and { {23}are in P4-7.
